name: Space Crabs!
description:
SPACE CRABS!

The crabs worship you like a God, but one is a phony. Ascend only the good crabs. I just wanted to do something with AI crabs. Don't worry about the win condition, there isn't one (a good one). Just play with the crabs for a bit and spook 'em.

CONTROLS:

A - D to move LEFT or RIGHT

SPACE to select the nearest crab

R to revert your light or deselect a crab

E to confirm selected crab.

~THIS TOOK MORE THAN 3 HOURS~

for TriJam-51 || Theme: "Who's the Enemy?"
